meanings.definition: The measurement or extent of something from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The width of the table is three feet.
meanings.sent2: She measured the width of the room before buying a new carpet.
meanings.sent3: The width of the cake was so impressive that it barely fit through the door.
meanings.sent4: The width of his knowledge spanned across various subjects.
meanings.sent5: The width of the river was so vast that it seemed to stretch to the horizon.

meanings.sent1: The width of her smile showed how happy she was.
meanings.sent2: The width of the road allowed for smooth traffic flow.
meanings.sent3: His generosity had a width that touched everyone around him.
meanings.sent4: The width of her experience in the field was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The width of the canyon took their breath away as they stood at the edge.
